CustomField.description: Maximum number of records DRE should process without kicking into Bulk Mode. Any more than this number will enable Bulk Mode (asynchronous processing). This setting is applied only if Auto-Bulk is enabled in DRE Settings
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maximum number of records DRE should process without kicking into Bulk Mode. Any more than this number will enable Bulk Mode (asynchronous processing). This setting is applied only if Auto-Bulk is enabled in DRE Settings
CustomField.label: Bulk Threshold
